Classic puzzle game, lots of fun, absolutely love this game

So by now you probably know the cake is indeed a lie, but just how deep did GLADoS's treachery run? Definitely recommend this game, not quite as puzzle-centric as Portal although the portals are still a central focus, but you do get a lot more story and worldbuilding, which I find fascinating.

This game is honestly amazing. It's so smart, it's pretty funny, the story is interesting, and the gameplay is fun, with new mechanics being introduced pretty much every chapter to keep things fresh. I can honestly say that I hope for another sequel.

Portal, ormai penso lo sappiano tutti, è un capolavoro.
Il suo gameplay, più avanzato rispetto al primo lo rende il massimo per chi ama il genere puzzle game.
In questo capitolo (più lungo rispetto al primo) si entra nel vivo della storia, la quale ha una svolta interessante per il giocatore, anche se meno tetra rispetto al primo.

woman funi 2

Todo, absolutamente todo está bien en este juego. Música, gráficos, historia, personajes, ambientación, jugabilidad, controles, dificultad, etc. Acierta en lo que muchos juegos actuales y pasados fallan: la historia no es contada, sino mostrada. En serio, uno podría simplemente no prestar atención a lo que le dicen o muestran y terminar el juego sin enterarse de nada. Puede parecer irrelevante, pero agrega mucho a la inmersión, pues uno siente que está viviendo la historia y no simplemente está yendo de una cinemática a otra. El modo cooperativo también es muy divertido. Es bastante corto, pero a veces una muy buena experiencia de corta duración resulta mejor que una experiencia pasable de 100 horas.

If you have a talented partner for co-op, this game goes by quickly but the speed at which you go does not lower the enjoyment of the game. The puzzles can be challenging and require a good deal of teamwork to solve. Beware overthinking and over complicating the levels though---some are far more simple to complete than you realize and it's easy to sink a good portion of time in trying to complete a level the "hard way".

This game may be older, but it's so well polished that it performs/looks better than most new games in 2020. Definitely worth purchasing and playing (just make sure you have someone to play with).

I got steam just so i could play this amazing game. I have since bought a few other games, but this was the initial motive. its a shame we will most likely never see a portal 3.

大家好！我是Valve工作室的集团董事长G胖，很高兴获得大家对我们《Portal 2》的肯定评价，我也是非常的开心。首先当初我们制作《Portal 2》的时候，是用创新的游戏内容、故事以及最初 Portal 那赢得超过 70 项以上业界奖项般的配乐打造出的。《Portal 2》的单人游戏部分带来充满活力的新角色、一大堆新鲜的解谜元素，以及更大、更加曲折的试验室。玩家将可以于前所未见的光圈科技实验室中探索，并且与在原游戏中引导你，偶尔想要把你杀掉的电脑陪伴者 GLaDOS 重逢。在2011年，这款游戏的画质以及各方面内容已经排到了世界一流，我们将继续制作《 Portal 》系列的后续内容，敬请期待……

翻译：Coco
校对：Peter
Simplemente, excelente

I really love Portal 2... I'm usually not the biggest fan of puzzle games but, this game is really fun and interesting... I prefer Portal 2 to the original because this one has better graphics with very smooth movements and even sight motion blur, and how they continued the story is just fantastic. I wasn't expecting myself to like Portal and Portal 2 when I bought them from the valve pack during the summer sale but, I found I get easily sucked into the games and have a great time. I would definitely recommend this game.
